title: Download Media — download_media
text: Function downloads files given urls. query parameter `value` used file name.

title: Download Media — download_media
text: urls, character vector fiel urls dest_dir, destination directory quiet, boolean suppress download file messages

title: Query Record API — query_record_api
text: Record API provides direct access Europeana data, modeled using Europeana Data Model (EDM). EDM open flexible data model featuring various kind resources relations , Record API (Europeana Collections Portal) supports retrieval segment EDM practical purposes. "atomic" EDM segments typically contain one Cultural Heritage Object (CHO), aggregation information connects metadata digital representations, number contextual resources related CHO, agents, locations, concepts, time.

title: Query Record API — query_record_api
text: id, string `RECORD_ID` form `/DATASET_ID/LOCAL_ID` path, string indicates version API ..., parameters passed query parameters

title: Europeana Search Api — query_search_api
text: Search API allows search Europeana repository metadata records media. Search API straightforward use. works similar fashion Europeana website comes interacting data. can use API search keywords, return entries contain words. can refine search advanced queries like Boolean Searches, can filter parts results advanced filtering.

title: Europeana Search Api — query_search_api
text: query, character string search term(s) rows, numeric indicates number records return path, character string describers API version ..., parameters passed get request

title: Europeana Search Api — query_search_api
text: query parameter Apache Lucene Query Syntax inheritly supported Search API. Users can use Lucene Apache SOLR guides get Europeana repository. basic usage searching particular keywords, - `qf` String	Query Refinement. parameter can defined  . See Query Syntax page information. - `reusability` String	Filter copyright status. Possible values open,  restricted permission. - `media`	Boolean	Filter records URL full media file  present edm:isShownBy edm:hasView metadata #' resolvable. - `thumbnail`	Boolean	Filter records thumbnail image  generated WebResource media resources  (thumbnail #' available edmPreview field). - `landingpage`	Boolean	Filter records link original object providers website (edm:isShownAt) present verified working. - `colourpalette`	String	Filter images one colours (see colour palette) image matches provided colour code. can provide parameter multiple times, search '' search provided colours. - `theme` String	Restrict query one Europeana Thematic Collections. possible values : archaelogy, art, fashion, industrial, manuscript, map, migration, music, nature, newspaper, photography, sport, ww1. - `sort`	String	Sorting records ascending descending order search fields. following fields supported: score (relenvancy search result), timestamp_created, timestamp_update, europeana_id, COMPLETENESS, is_fulltext, has_thumbnails, has_media. Sorting one field possible supplying comma separated values. also possible randomly order items using keyword "random" instead field name. can also request fixed random order indicating seed "random_SEED" useful paginating along randomized order. Use: field_name+sort_order. ``` query_search_api("arioch") ```` details synatx queries read officila Europeana documentation[QUERY SYNTAX](https://pro.europeana.eu/page/search#syntax).
